name: KudzeNewsletterCheckboxPlugin

infos.name: Newsletter Checkbox Plugin für Shopware 6
infos.description:
Hallo! 


Dieses Plugin ist im prinzip einfach. Es fügt einfach ein Newsletter-Kontrollkästchen bei der Kontoanmeldung und bei der Kassenanmeldung hinzu. 

Dies funktionier sowohl für Gastbenutzer als auch für registrierte Benutzer(kann man konfigurieren). 


Wenn Sie die E-Mail-Verifizierung verwenden, wird der Benutzer nur in den Newsletter aufgenommen, wenn er seine E-Mail nach der Registrierung zusätzlich verifiziert hat.

Wenn Sie keine E-Mail-Verifizierung verwenden, wird der Benutzer sofort nach der Registrierung hinzugefügt. 


Das Plugin hat außerdem drei konfigurierbare Optionen: 

1) Sie können das Newsletter-Kontrollkästchen automatisch aktivieren lassen. 

2) Sie können das Newsletter-Kontrollkästchen von der Checkout-Seite entfernen. 

3) Sie können das Newsletter-Kontrollkästchen für Gastbenutzer unzugänglich machen. 


Der Text bzw. die Meldung im Front-End für den Newsletter ist in Snippets definiert, d.h. man kann den Text der Newsletter-Checkbox über das Admin-Panel leicht ändern. 


Ein kurzes Tutorial/Walkthrough ist auf Youtube verfügbar: https://youtu.be/pbBwFw8gUqg

infos.name: Newsletter checkbox plugin for Shopware 6
infos.description:
Hello!


This plugin is kind off simple one. Just adds a newsletter checkbox at account registration, and checkout registration pages.

Works with guests users (you can configure) and with registered users.


If you're using email verification, the user is only added in newsletter after he has verified his email after registration.

If you're not using email verification user is added instantly right after registering.


Plugin also has three configurable options:

1) You may have newsletter checkbox checked automatically.

2) You may remove newsletter checkbox from checkout reigster page.

3) You may make newsletter checkbox box inacessible for guest users.


Newsletter label is defined in snippets, meaning that one can easily change newsletter checkbox text though admin panel.


A short tutorial/walkthrough is available at Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pbBwFw8gUqg&t=38s&ab_channel=Kudz%C4%97

changelog.text:
* Updated to work with Shopware 6.5.0.0-RC3


* Updated the component's "newsletter-notice.html.twig" classnames for checkbox to appear with same stylings as privacy notice checkbox.


* Since Shopware 6.5.0.0 added a new configurable option inside "Settings > Newsletter > Double opt-in for registered customers". The plugin from this version will be using that checkbox to define whether to send customers double opt in newsletter email or subscribe them to it immediately. Which means, that the email double opt-in checkboxes no longer has any affect on plugin's inner workings.


* Since Shopware 6.5.0.0 removed "newsletter" column from Customer table. We added a new table "customer_pending_newsletter" for tracking customers which have the newsletter checkbox checked. After customer has finished newsletter sign up process or in the case that the customer was deleted, the row will be deleted from the table.

• Improved support for Shopware's double opt in.
  • If shopware's newsletter's double opt in setting is enabled customer will be sent an newsletter confirmation email after registering. (Old behaviour was to add newsletter recipient as instantly active)
  • For normal customers, if shopware's customer double opt in is enabled, he will not be sent any double confirmation mails. He will be added to newsletter instantly after he has verified his mail for the account.
  • For guest customers, if shopware's guest customer double opt in is enabled, he will not be sent any double confirmation mails. He will be added to newsletter instantly after he has verified his mail for the guest account.

+ Shopware 6.4.14.0 support.

+ Added configuration checkbox: "If checked, newsletter option will be hid in account registration.".

+ Plugin's configuration is now sales-channel aware.

+ Code improvements.
